subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Intense Holiday, who finished 12th in the Kentucky Derby on May 3 and was being pointed toward the Belmont Stakes on June 7, was retired from racing Tuesday, the owner Starlight Racing said.
snippet: Intense Holiday, who finished 12th in the Kentucky Derby on May 3 and was being pointed toward the Belmont Stakes on June 7, was retired from racing Tuesday, the owner Starlight Racing said.
